leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

queries: [WEB] brain computer interface deep learning github

tools.name: AmadeusGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for generating behavioral analysis code
tools.detailed_description: A platform that turns natural language descriptions of behaviors into machine-executable code for behavioral analysis, facilitating the integration of computer vision and neuroscience workflows.

tools.name: CEBRA
tools.one_line_profile: Learnable latent embeddings for joint behavioral and neural analysis
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning method and library for non-linear dimensionality reduction that can leverage auxiliary variables (like behavior) to learn consistent latent embeddings from neural data.

tools.name: Brain-Cog
tools.one_line_profile: Brain-inspired Cognitive Intelligence Engine based on Spiking Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for brain-inspired artificial intelligence and multi-scale brain simulation, focusing on spiking neural networks (SNNs) to decode mechanisms of human intelligence.

tools.name: Deep-BCI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning software package for BCI intention recognition
tools.detailed_description: An open software package designed to develop BCI-based brain and cognitive computing technology, specifically for recognizing user intention using deep learning models.

tools.name: candock
tools.one_line_profile: Time series signal analysis and classification framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the analysis and classification of time series signals, applicable to physiological signal processing.

tools.name: EEG-Feature-Extraction-Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for EEG feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox offering over 30 types of feature extraction methods specifically for Electroencephalogram (EEG) applications.

tools.name: BrainDecoderToolbox2
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab library for brain decoding analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab library designed for brain decoding analysis, supporting specific data formats and machine learning analysis for fMRI and EEG data.

tools.name: Neural_Decoding
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for decoding neural activity using various machine learning methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a collection of methods for decoding neural activity, including Wiener Filters, Support Vector Regression, XGBoost, and Neural Networks, designed to facilitate neural decoding research.

tools.name: neural-decoder
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network decoders for Quantum Error Correcting Codes
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing neural network-based decoders for quantum error correcting codes, specifically targeting toric codes and other topological codes.

tools.name: pybci
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for creating real-time Brain-Computer Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables the creation of real-time BCIs by leveraging Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) for data acquisition and standard machine learning libraries (PyTorch, SKLearn, TensorFlow) for processing.

tools.name: PosDefManifoldML.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for Riemannian geometry machine learning on positive definite matrices
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for performing machine learning on the manifold of Positive Definite Matrices, widely used in EEG signal processing (e.g., covariance matrices) for Brain-Computer Interfaces.

tools.name: MOABB
tools.one_line_profile: Mother of All BCI Benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark framework for Brain-Computer Interface algorithms, providing a unified interface to various datasets and classification pipelines to ensure reproducible research.

tools.name: OpenBCI_GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Data visualization and acquisition software for OpenBCI hardware
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform graphical user interface for visualizing, recording, and streaming data from OpenBCI biosensing boards (Cyton, Ganglion), supporting real-time signal processing.

tools.name: dpeeg
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolbox for EEG data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight deep learning library designed for EEG data analysis, providing utilities for data loading, preprocessing, and model training/evaluation.

tools.name: EEG-DL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning library for EEG signal classification
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based library providing implementations of various deep learning models (CNN, RNN, SAE, etc.) specifically tailored for EEG signal classification tasks.

tools.name: NeuroRA
tools.one_line_profile: Python Toolbox for Multimode Neural Data Representation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for Representational Analysis of neural data, including Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA), Inter-Subject Correlation (ISC), and Spatiotemporal Pattern Similarity (STPS).

tools.name: lfads-torch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Latent Factor Analysis via Dynamical Systems (LFADS)
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the LFADS and AutoLFADS algorithms, which are deep learning methods for inferring latent dynamics from neural population spiking activity.

tools.name: Braindecode
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning software to decode EEG, ECG or MEG signals
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning library for decoding electrophysiological signals (EEG, MEG, ECG). It provides data loading, preprocessing, and implementations of state-of-the-art deep learning models for BCI tasks.

tools.name: BRAND
tools.one_line_profile: Backend for Real-time Asynchronous Neural Decoding
tools.detailed_description: A modular and extensible software architecture for real-time brain-computer interface (BCI) experiments. It handles data acquisition, processing, and decoding in an asynchronous manner.

tools.name: BrainMagick
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MEG and EEG brain signal encoding and decoding
tools.detailed_description: A training and evaluation pipeline for encoding and decoding brain signals (MEG/EEG) using deep learning. It supports various tasks including speech perception decoding.

tools.name: bcisimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop BCI simulator for testing real-time neural decoding algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A simple closed-loop Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) simulator designed to test and validate real-time neural decoding algorithms in a controlled environment.

tools.name: DeepEEG
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning integration for MNE-Python EEG objects using TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A library that facilitates the application of Deep Learning models (via TensorFlow) directly onto EEG data structures managed by MNE-Python, streamlining the pipeline from preprocessing to classification.

tools.name: LFADS Run Manager
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for Latent Factor Analysis via Dynamical Systems (LFADS)
tools.detailed_description: A run manager interface for LFADS, a deep learning method to infer latent dynamics from single-trial neural spiking data, facilitating model training and hyperparameter management.

tools.name: decodanda
tools.one_line_profile: Library for decoding and geometrical analysis of neural population activity
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the decoding and geometrical analysis of neural activity, implementing best practices for neural data analysis.

tools.name: mTRF-Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB package for modelling multivariate stimulus-response data
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for modelling multivariate stimulus-response data, specifically designed for mapping between continuous sensory stimuli (e.g., speech) and neural signals (e.g., EEG/MEG) using temporal response functions (TRFs).

tools.name: UniTS
tools.one_line_profile: Unified multi-task foundation model for time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A unified foundation model for time series analysis capable of handling various tasks including classification, forecasting, and anomaly detection, applicable to neural time-series data (EEG/LFP).

tools.name: DeepSeparator
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for EEG artifact removal and source separation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based framework designed for removing artifacts from EEG signals, specifically targeting EOG and EMG noise, to improve signal quality for downstream analysis.

tools.name: EEGdenoiseNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for deep learning-based EEG denoising
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset suited for training and testing deep learning-based EEG denoising models, facilitating performance comparison across different architectures.

tools.name: bci_toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for ERP and SSVEP based BCI classification
tools.detailed_description: A classification toolbox designed for processing and classifying Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) data, specifically focusing on Event-Related Potentials (ERP) and Steady-State Visually Evoked Potentials (SSVEP).

tools.name: OpenBCI_Processing
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy GUI for OpenBCI data processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: The processing GUI for OpenBCI hardware, enabling real-time visualization, filtering, and processing of EEG/EMG/ECG data. (Note: Deprecated in favor of newer GUIs but remains a functional tool).

tools.name: EEGLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Library for EEG feature learning using convolutional neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A set of functions for supervised feature learning and classification of mental states from EEG data, utilizing an approach that converts EEG signals into 2D images for processing by CNNs.

tools.name: bci.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for EEG signal processing and BCI
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library enabling EEG signal processing and machine learning directly in the browser, facilitating the development of web-based Brain-Computer Interface applications.

tools.name: torch-neural-ssm
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for Neural State-Space Models and Latent Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Neural State-Space Models (SSMs) and latent dynamics functions in PyTorch, designed for high-dimensional forecasting and modeling of dynamic systems.

tools.name: EEG_Classifier
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB framework for EEG data classification
tools.detailed_description: A general MATLAB framework designed to streamline the process of EEG data classification, providing structures for feature extraction and model training.

tools.name: ICLabel
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic EEG independent component classification plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An automated tool (plugin for EEGLAB) that classifies independent components (ICs) of EEG data into categories such as brain, muscle, eye, and heart artifacts, aiding in artifact removal.

tools.name: pyglm
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian inference for interpretable neural spike train models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fitting Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to neural spike train data using fully-Bayesian inference algorithms, enabling the analysis of functional connectivity and stimulus response.

tools.name: autolfads-tf2
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow 2 implementation of LFADS and AutoLFADS for neural dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow 2.0 implementation of Latent Factor Analysis via Dynamical Systems (LFADS) and AutoLFADS, providing a framework for inferring latent dynamics from single-trial neural population activity.

tools.name: ARL-EEGModels
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of standard CNN models for EEG signal classification
tools.detailed_description: A curated library of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architectures (including EEGNet, DeepConvNet, ShallowConvNet) implemented in TensorFlow/Keras, specifically optimized for EEG signal classification and Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) tasks.

tools.name: mneflow
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for deep learning on MNE-python EEG/MEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that bridges MNE-Python and TensorFlow, providing a streamlined interface for training, evaluating, and interpreting deep neural networks for EEG and MEG decoding tasks directly from MNE data structures.
